ballInTheHolePop.step1: Select the difficulty level and start the game.
ballInTheHolePop.step2: At the beginning of each round, a mathematical operation will be displayed. Your task is to find the correct result.
ballInTheHolePop.step3: Lead the ball so that it falls into the hole corresponding to the correct result of the mathematical operation.
ballInTheHolePop.step4: The game ends when the ball falls into the wrong hole or when you complete all levels.
ballInTheHolePop.enjoy: Enjoy playing Ball in the Hole!
